channel.title: Downloads on Hop
channel.description: Recent content in Downloads on Hop

item.title: Download
item.description: There is no official release of Apache Hop yet, but you can take a look at the latest build of our software. Pre-apache release Preview release 0.30 here Current Development Builds Important These are not official releases! Latest Snapshots (0.50-SNAPSHOT) here These are the latest builds available directly from the master branch. If you find issues please file a ticket on our Jira please make sure to check if no ticket for your issue has been created yet, or join us on our chat and come discuss your ideas.
